description: This app helps you to quickly model and analyze income producing properties to determine the price to offer based upon how much you want to earn on the cash you invest.  You can also easily determine the rent you would need to collect in order to justify a given price.  This is a simple tool to give you facts to help negotiate a great price in the current real estate market.  It lets you work with multiple different scenarios, adjusting target cash capitalization rate, estimated vacancy, operating expenses, down payment, financing rate and term to match your personal goals and assumptions.  Stop wasting time, in less than a minute you can size up a potential deal and know if its worth getting in the car to take a closer look.  Update 1.0.2 – Modified to clarify results and eliminate confusion.  Added “Target Cash-on-Cash Return %” to preferences, eliminated incorrect label “Cash Cap Rate”, now shows Cap Rate % and Cash-On-Cash Return % on results page, corrected calculation of Value at Target Cap Rate, added Value at “Target” Cash-on-Cash Return calculation.
